Title: The Challenger's Ring: Chao the Voice
Description:
It looks like you're quite the fighter, $p.

Chao heard about it, and she's been talking about how she'd kick your...

Well, let's just say I think you should challenge her and try to get her respect.
ObjectivesText: Challenge Chao the Voice, and then defeat her in combat at Shado-Pan Garrison in Townlong Steppes.
PortraitGiverText: An able bodied (and loud mouthed) Blackguard of the Shado-Pan.
RewardText:
I'm sure there's no hard feelings. She just loves a good fight.

You should talk to her next time I have some missions for you. She's quite an able fighter, as I'm sure you saw.
